mapper.select: select d.ecode,d.workHours,d.depreciation,(d.workHours - sum(pre.rdHour)) as remainHour,d.month from d_equipment d left join p_rdEquipment pre on pre.companyId = d.companyId and pre.month = d.month and pre.ecode = d.ecode and pre.projectId != #{projectId} where d.companyId = #{companyId} and d.month in (#{m}) and d.ecode in (#{ecode}) group by d.companyId,d.ecode,d.month
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO p_rdEquipment (createTime,lastUpdateTime,creatorId,lastUpdatorId,msCreatorId,msLastUpdatorId, companyId,projectId,`month`,rdDepreciation,ecode,rdHour) VALUES
(#{l.createTime},#{l.lastUpdateTime},#{l.creatorId},#{l.lastUpdatorId},#{l.msCreatorId},#{l.msLastUpdatorId}, #{l.companyId},#{l.projectId},#{l.month},#{l.rdDepreciation},#{l.ecode},#{l.rdHour})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rdDepreciation=values(rdDepreciation), rdHour=values(rdHour), msLastUpdatorId=values(msLastUpdatorId), lastUpdatorId=values(lastUpdatorId), lastUpdateTime=values(lastUpdateTime), powerUnitPrice=values(powerUnitPrice), powerRate=values(powerRate)
mapper.select: select ie.effect,e.ename,e.emodal,ie.ecode,sum(pr.rdHour) as yearHour from i_equipment ie INNER JOIN rdEquipment re on re.companyId=ie.companyId and re.ecode=ie.ecode and re.year=ie.year INNER join equipment e on ie.ecode=e.ecode and ie.companyId=e.companyId INNER join p_rdEquipment pr on ie.ecode=pr.ecode and ie.companyId=pr.companyId and ie.projectId=pr.projectId where ie.projectId=#{projectId} and ie.companyId=#{companyId} and re.etype != 40001 and ie.year=#{year} group by ie.effect,e.ename,e.emodal,ie.ecode
